summary: Diff updates the favicon generator to draw a white circle background with a pink heart and defines the expected PNG filenames, but it does not add the required generated PNG assets under `frontend/public/assets/generated/` nor update `frontend/index.html` link tags. An unrequested `frontend/public/favicon.ico` file was added, and project metadata/summary files were modified despite the request being limited to favicon assets/HTML alignment.

missing_requirements.requirement: Regenerate and add the complete favicon PNG image set (pink heart centered on solid white circular background) in `frontend/public/assets/generated/` with the exact filenames referenced by `frontend/index.html`, and ensure old assets are removed or no longer referenced.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff does not show any of the required PNG files being added under `frontend/public/assets/generated/` (only a `.ico` was added). There is also no evidence that old favicon assets were removed or that references were updated to ensure only the new set is used.
evidence: ADDED FILES: frontend/public/favicon.ico (only new asset shown)

missing_requirements.requirement: Update `frontend/index.html` favicon `<link>` tags to match the regenerated favicon set under `/assets/generated/` (paths, filenames, sizes) and remove stale/duplicate references.
missing_requirements.reason: `frontend/index.html` is not listed as modified, so there is no evidence the favicon `<link>` tags were updated or that stale/duplicate references were removed.
evidence: MODIFIED FILES list does not include frontend/index.html

hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest/REQs focus on PNG assets under `frontend/public/assets/generated/` and aligning `frontend/index.html` to those assets; adding a standalone `.ico` at `frontend/public/favicon.ico` is not requested and may introduce an extra/stale favicon source.
These files are not mentioned in the BuildRequest requirements; the request is scoped to favicon assets, `frontend/index.html`, and the generator utility.
